data.message: What happened to the old background colors for status updates? Suddenly, I woke up one day and there were these new awful colors and designs and the others are now inaccessible. I want the old colors and designs back!

replies.message: Thanks for your feedback, David. We're constantly working to improve the Facebook experience for everyone and if there's something specific we can do to improve yours, please let us know at: https://www.facebook.com/help/feedback/?ref=gfmod. -Jessica
